text: avarodane avara pravadi helidaru; ‘‘khanditavagiyu avana alvikeya (sindhutvakke) puraveyagi, a pettigeyu nim'ma balige baruvudu. Adaralli nim'modeyana kadeyinda banda nem'madiya sadhanagalive mattu musara santati hagu harunara santatiyu bittu hoda ulikegalive. Adannu malak‌galu hottiddare. Nivu visvasigalagiddare khanditavagiyu adaralli nimagagi purave ide’’
